body:
Well, I am going to be heading off to a summer camp for a month in about 20 minutes :3 It's called camp Cheley, and located down in Estes Park, Colorado! This is going to be my fourth year there :D

If you are going to  summer camp, or have already gone to a summer camp, feel free to share you experiences below!

title: Summer camp!

replies.body:
I go every summer for 2 weeks in a summer camp on the island Sylt in Germany.
It's always Fun, but sometimes the weather is crap.
Have FUN !
